TEXT: A mysterious street racer from a far off land. NL Seeks to test his skills on the ultimate downhill, but first, he must reach the top.
NL You drift past the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us,~ ~determined~ ~one~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
